mapper.select: SELECT sc.custom_frontImageUrl, sc.custom_backImageUrl, sc.cloth_size, sc.cloth_color, sc.cloth_date, cl.cloth_name, sc.cloth_totalCount, cl.cloth_id, cl.cloth_discount, cl.cloth_defaultImage FROM order_info oi JOIN shoppingcart sc ON oi.user_seq = sc.user_seq JOIN clothes cl ON sc.cloth_id = cl.cloth_id WHERE oi.user_seq = #{userSeq}
